document_data.title: Inn
document_data.name: The Paladin Inn
document_data.mainbody: '''The Paladin Inn''' was an inn in [[Velprintalar]], [[Aglarond]], in [[1368 DR]]. Its patrons were the wealthier nobles and merchants visiting the city, including visiting dignitaries. A room with a breakfast of fruit and [[ale]] was five [[gold piece]]s, while a supper of fish or fowl with [[Aglarondan wine]] was five [[silver piece]]s.
